## Import Data
```{r data}
#original_data = readRDS(here("Data", "full_ok_cupid_cleaned.rds"))

new_features = read_csv(here("Data", "newfeatures.csv")) %>% select(-X1) %>% as.matrix()
```

## CLARA
```{r}
nb <- NbClust(new_features, distance = "euclidean", min.nc = 2,
        max.nc = 10, method = "complete", index ="all")
clara_mod = clara(new_features, 3)
clara_mod %>% silhouette(full = TRUE)

```
